solution_line_template: He made ${mowing_yards_income} mowing yards, ${birthday_income} for his birthday, ${selling_games_income} selling items and ${odd_jobs_income} doing odd jobs so he made {mowing_yards_income}+{birthday_income}+{selling_games_income}+{odd_jobs_income} = $<<{mowing_yards_income}+{birthday_income}+{selling_games_income}+{odd_jobs_income}={total_income}>>{total_income}
He made ${total_income} and will save {savings_percent_text}% so he saves {total_income}*{savings_percent_decimal} = $<<{total_income}*{savings_percent_decimal}={amount_saved}>>{amount_saved}
